name: Peppermill Sports Bar
description: The Sports Bar at the Peppermill Resort features a state-of-the-art curved video display — the largest of its kind — composed of 34 high-definition screens in a two-sided, 360-degree configuration. Centrally located next to the Race and Sportsbook (which underwent a $3.5 million upgrade featuring a 110-foot-wide LED screen), it's a top-tier destination for watching games. The bar serves craft beers, cocktails, and New York-style deli food from the adjacent Sports Deli. Bar-top video poker is also available.
shortDescription: State-of-the-art sports bar with 34-screen curved display next to Peppermill's $3.5M Race & Sportsbook.

faqs.question: What makes the Peppermill Sports Bar special?
faqs.answer: The Peppermill's legendary service combined with state-of-the-art screens and sports betting creates a premium viewing experience.

faqs.question: Is there sports betting?
faqs.answer: Yes, sports betting windows are integrated into the bar area.

faqs.question: How far is the Peppermill from downtown?
faqs.answer: About 10 minutes south of downtown on S Virginia Street, easily accessible by car or rideshare.

meta.title: Peppermill Sports Bar – Premier Sports Viewing Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Watch every game at the Peppermill Sports Bar with state-of-the-art screens, betting, and legendary Reno hospitality.

testimonials.quote: We ended every day of our golf trip at Peppermill Sports Bar. Great selection, friendly bartenders, and the kind of place where your group can be loud and happy after a great round.
testimonials.author: Adam L.

testimonials.quote: Peppermill Sports Bar has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside peppermill-resort-spa-casino. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Gary F.
